subject: Few Things About KV6003
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I hope you're well. I have a few things I wanted to ask about KV6003:

1. Could you confirm the deadline for the final project submission? Blackboard says May 7th but the module handbook says May 6th.
2. I'm struggling to find relevant papers for my literature review — could you recommend any journals or databases I should be searching?
3. Are we allowed to use ChatGPT to help with debugging our code, and if so, how do we reference it?

Apologies for the long email but I wanted to get everything in one message rather than sending three separate ones.

Kind regards,
Olivia Hughes

subject: kv5002 stuff
body:
hi dr smith

few things:
- when is the assignment due again?
- also i cant find the slides from week 5 on blackboard
- and my attendance is showing wrong can u fix it

thx
jake

subject: Extension Request and Supervision Rescheduling
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I'm writing about two things regarding KV6003. Firstly, I've been unwell with a chest infection for the past week and I'd like to request a short extension on the interim report. I have a GP letter which I can provide.

Secondly, I won't be able to make our supervision meeting on Thursday because of a hospital appointment. Could we reschedule to the following week? I'm available Monday or Wednesday afternoon.

Thank you for understanding.

Best wishes,
Rebecca Lawrence

subject: kv4006 questions and mark query
body:
hi

ive got a few questions about kv4006. first off when are we getting our coursework marks back?? its been ages. also i heard the exam has been moved to a different date is that true?? and lastly where can i find the revision materials u mentioned in the last lecture

sorry for all the questions lol
ben

subject: Module Feedback and Next Year Planning
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

Now that KV5002 is wrapping up, I wanted to do two things. First, I wanted to say that the module has been really well taught and I've learned a lot — the practical sessions were particularly valuable.

Second, I'm choosing my modules for next year and I was wondering if you could advise on which optional modules would complement KV6003 well? I'm interested in AI and data science.

Thank you,
Emily Chen

subject: URGENT - Multiple Issues
body:
HI DR SMITH

I HAVE SEVERAL PROBLEMS AND I DONT KNOW WHO TO TALK TO.

1. I MISSED THE KV5002 SUBMISSION DEADLINE BECAUSE I WAS IN HOSPITAL
2. I STILL HAVENT GOT MY KV4006 MARK BACK FROM LAST MONTH
3. MY TIMETABLE IS SHOWING THE WRONG SEMINAR GROUP
4. I CANT ACCESS THE KV6003 BLACKBOARD PAGE

PLEASE HELP IM SO STRESSED

MICHAEL

subject: Quick Update and Questions
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

Just a quick email with an update and a couple of questions about KV6003.

Update: I've completed the data collection phase and have started preprocessing. The dataset is looking good — 200 emails across 6 categories.

Questions:
- Should I include the preprocessing code in the appendix or just describe it in the methodology?
- My Turnitin submission from last week still shows as 'pending' — is this normal?
- Are we allowed to use spaCy or do you prefer we stick to NLTK?

Thanks,
Zara Ahmed

subject: worried about everything
body:
hi dr smith

sorry to dump all this on u but im really struggling atm. i failed the kv4006 coursework and i dont understand the feedback. ive also missed 3 weeks of kv5002 lectures because of personal stuff and i dont know how to catch up. and now my student finance has been delayed so i cant even afford my rent

i know most of this isnt ur problem but i didnt know who else to email. is there someone at the university who can help with all of this??

thanks
connor

subject: KV5002 Group Project - Multiple Concerns
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I'm writing about several concerns with the KV5002 group project:

1. One of our group members (I'd rather not name them in email) has not contributed and isn't responding to messages. What's the process for reporting this?
2. We're unsure whether our project topic has been approved — we submitted the proposal form two weeks ago but haven't heard back.
3. The group presentation is scheduled for Week 11 but two of us have a clash with a KV4006 lab session. Can we present at a different time?

Apologies for the lengthy email.

Best regards,
Sophie Green

subject: catching up after being away
body:
hi dr smith

ive been off for 3 weeks because of health stuff (i submitted an EC form). im back now and trying to catch up but i dont know where to start. can u tell me:

- what topics did kv5002 cover in weeks 8-10
- are the lecture recordings available
- has anything been set that i need to know about
- do i need to apply for anything else or is my EC form enough

sorry for all the questions
katie

subject: End of Year Admin and Project Query
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

As the academic year is coming to a close, I wanted to check a few things:

1. Is there a formal process for requesting my KV6003 supervisor to be my reference for graduate jobs?
2. When will final module grades be confirmed and published?
3. I noticed a discrepancy between my KV4006 grade on Blackboard (58%) and the student portal (55%) — which is correct?

Thank you for your help throughout the year.

Kind regards,
Isla Ferguson

subject: need help with loads of stuff
body:
hi

ok so basically everything is going wrong with kv6003 right now:
- my python code keeps crashing and i dont know why
- i cant find the dataset format requirements anywhere
- ive been really anxious and havent been sleeping
- also i think i might have submitted the wrong file for the interim report

can i come see u in office hours this week??

thx
josh

subject: Placement Preparation and Module Questions
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I'm going on placement next year and I wanted to discuss a few things:

1. For my KV6003 project, can I base it on work I'll be doing during placement, or does it need to be independent?
2. I need a reference letter for my placement application — would you be willing to provide one?
3. Will I still have access to Blackboard and university resources while on placement?

I appreciate your time.

Thank you,
Hannah Wright

subject: kv4006 and kv5002 problems
body:
hi dr smith

two separate things sorry:

for kv4006 i dont understand the feedback on my ER diagram. it says 'normalisation issues' but i thought i normalised it to 3NF. can u explain what was wrong??

for kv5002 i cant access the github repo for the group project. the link expired or something and none of my group can get in either

thx
dan

subject: Returning Student - Multiple Queries
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I'm returning to university after a year out on interruption. I have several questions:

1. Do I need to re-register for KV6003 formally or does my previous enrolment carry over?
2. My previous supervisor has left the university — who will be assigned as my new supervisor?
3. I submitted a partial draft before I left. Is this still on record or do I need to start again?
4. Are the module learning outcomes the same as last year or has the curriculum changed?

I'd appreciate a meeting to discuss the transition back.

Thank you,
David Kim

subject: Dissertation and Career Advice
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

I hope this isn't overstepping but I'd value your advice on two things. My KV6003 project is on NLP-based email classification and I'm really enjoying it. I wanted to ask:

1. Do you think the project has potential to be extended into a publishable paper? If so, what would I need to add?
2. I'm considering a career in NLP/AI research. Based on my work so far, do you think a masters or PhD would be a good next step?

No pressure to answer the career question if you'd rather not — I just respect your opinion.

Best wishes,
Sarah Thompson

subject: complaint and extension request
body:
hi dr smith

im going to be blunt. the kv5002 assignment brief is really unclear and ive wasted days trying to figure out what section B is actually asking for. ive asked 3 other students and none of us agree on what its meant to be. i think this is unfair and the brief should be rewritten or clarified.

because of the confusion ive lost time and now i need an extension. i know thats not a proper extenuating circumstance but its the universitys fault not mine

sorry if this comes across as rude im just frustrated
alex

subject: International Student - Various Concerns
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

As an international student I have a few concerns I'd appreciate your help with:

1. The KV4006 exam is scheduled during Ramadan. Will there be any accommodations for fasting students, such as adjusted timing or breaks?
2. I'm having difficulty understanding some of the British-specific references in the KV5002 case studies. Are there alternative materials available?
3. My visa requires me to maintain 80% attendance. I missed some sessions due to illness — will my EC claim cover the attendance gap?

Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
Amir Hussain

subject: summer resit and next year stuff
body:
hi dr smith

so i failed kv4006 which is annoying but it is what it is. couple of questions:

1. when is the resit and is it an exam or coursework
2. if i pass the resit do i still get capped at 40%
3. can i still take kv5002 next semester while doing the resit or is kv4006 a prerequisite
4. also unrelated but the kv5002 reading list link is broken

thx
liam

subject: Thank You and Final Questions
body:
Dear Dr Smith,

As we approach the end of the year, I wanted to thank you for your support throughout KV6003. Your feedback on my drafts has been invaluable and the project has genuinely been the highlight of my degree.

A few final questions:
1. Is there a specific time on May 7th the submission needs to be in, or is it midnight?
2. Do you have any advice for the viva? I'm quite nervous about presenting.
3. Would you be open to staying in touch after graduation? I'd like to keep you updated on where I end up.

With sincere thanks,
Fatima Al-Rashid
